titleStmt.title: Post nubila Phoebus, or, A sermon of thanksgiving for the safe and happy returne of our gracious soveraign ... preached in the city of Aberden at the desire of the lord provest, bailies and councell thereof, upon the XIX [19] day of Iune / by Iohn Patersone ...
titleStmt.author: Paterson, John, 1604?-1679.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
